import{USER_ROLES}from'./roles';export let PERMISSIONS=/*#__PURE__*/function(PERMISSIONS){// Application permissions
PERMISSIONS["VIEW_APPLICATIONS"]="VIEW_APPLICATIONS";PERMISSIONS["CREATE_APPLICATION"]="CREATE_APPLICATION";PERMISSIONS["EDIT_APPLICATION"]="EDIT_APPLICATION";PERMISSIONS["CHANGE_APPLICATION_STATUS"]="CHANGE_APPLICATION_STATUS";PERMISSIONS["ASSIGN_APPLICATION"]="ASSIGN_APPLICATION";PERMISSIONS["DELETE_APPLICATION"]="DELETE_APPLICATION";// Company permissions
PERMISSIONS["VIEW_COMPANIES"]="VIEW_COMPANIES";PERMISSIONS["CREATE_COMPANY"]="CREATE_COMPANY";PERMISSIONS["EDIT_COMPANY"]="EDIT_COMPANY";PERMISSIONS["DELETE_COMPANY"]="DELETE_COMPANY";PERMISSIONS["ASSIGN_COMPANY_ADMIN"]="ASSIGN_COMPANY_ADMIN";// Client permissions
PERMISSIONS["VIEW_CLIENTS"]="VIEW_CLIENTS";PERMISSIONS["CREATE_CLIENT"]="CREATE_CLIENT";PERMISSIONS["EDIT_CLIENT"]="EDIT_CLIENT";PERMISSIONS["DELETE_CLIENT"]="DELETE_CLIENT";// Advisor permissions
PERMISSIONS["VIEW_ADVISORS"]="VIEW_ADVISORS";PERMISSIONS["CREATE_ADVISOR"]="CREATE_ADVISOR";PERMISSIONS["EDIT_ADVISOR"]="EDIT_ADVISOR";PERMISSIONS["DELETE_ADVISOR"]="DELETE_ADVISOR";// Dashboard permissions
PERMISSIONS["VIEW_DASHBOARD"]="VIEW_DASHBOARD";PERMISSIONS["VIEW_REPORTS"]="VIEW_REPORTS";return PERMISSIONS;}({});export const ROLE_PERMISSIONS={[USER_ROLES.SUPERADMIN]:Object.values(PERMISSIONS),[USER_ROLES.ADVISOR]:[PERMISSIONS.VIEW_APPLICATIONS,PERMISSIONS.CREATE_APPLICATION,PERMISSIONS.EDIT_APPLICATION,PERMISSIONS.CHANGE_APPLICATION_STATUS,PERMISSIONS.VIEW_COMPANIES,PERMISSIONS.VIEW_CLIENTS,PERMISSIONS.CREATE_CLIENT,PERMISSIONS.EDIT_CLIENT,PERMISSIONS.VIEW_DASHBOARD],[USER_ROLES.COMPANY_ADMIN]:[PERMISSIONS.VIEW_APPLICATIONS,PERMISSIONS.VIEW_COMPANIES,PERMISSIONS.VIEW_CLIENTS,PERMISSIONS.VIEW_DASHBOARD,PERMISSIONS.CHANGE_APPLICATION_STATUS]};export function hasPermission(userRole,permission){var _ROLE_PERMISSIONS$use;if(!userRole||!permission)return false;return((_ROLE_PERMISSIONS$use=ROLE_PERMISSIONS[userRole])===null||_ROLE_PERMISSIONS$use===void 0?void 0:_ROLE_PERMISSIONS$use.includes(permission))||false;}export function hasAllPermissions(userRole,permissions){if(!userRole||!permissions.length)return false;return permissions.every(permission=>hasPermission(userRole,permission));}export function hasAnyPermission(userRole,permissions){if(!userRole||!permissions.length)return false;return permissions.some(permission=>hasPermission(userRole,permission));}
